description: Details of sustainability measures pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref PP/2012/4463 dated 25/03/2013 for: variation of planning condition 2 of planning permission P/2010/2909 at this site (granted on appeal Ref: APP/A5270/A/10/2141217 dated 26/05/11) for minor material amendments (to modify the layout, form, design and appearance of the block of flats to match the design and appearance approved under planning permission P/2011/0539 dated 24/09/2012, to revise the housing mix within the block of flats to 2 x 1 bed, 17 x 2 bed and 1 x 3 bed,  to revise the energy strategy to comply with Code of Sustainable Homes Level 4 including the removal of the basement, and additional information provided on materials, construction methods, noise mitigation, hard and soft landscaping, boundary treatment, tree protection, renewable energy, affordable housing and highway visibility splays),  for demolition of existing building and erection of a part two, three and four storey building (with basement level) containing 20 flats (3 x 1 bed, 16 x 2 bed, and 1 x 3 bed), communal amenity space including roof gardens, car and cycle parking, refuse and recycling storage, and two terraces comprising 9 x 2 storey 3 bed houses (including semi-basements), private amenity space, associated landscaping and car parking with access achieved from Cherington Road (see ref: PP/2015/0085 for info/documents/plans online)
